    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2204</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2204</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com es diu 'jo també' i 'jo tampoc'?</string>
            <string language="en">How do you say "Me too" and "Me neither" correctly?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie sagen Sie "mich auch" und "mich keine" richtig?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment dites-vous "moi trop" et "moi ni l'un ni 
l'autre" correctement ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como você me diz "me demasiado" e "nenhuns" 
corretamente?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come lo dite "me ugualmente" e "nessuno" 
correttamente?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς με λέτε "με επίσησ" και "κανένασ" σωστά;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva que treballa la manera de dir 'jo també' i 'jo tampoc' en anglès mitjançant activitats en un context comunicatiu.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on how to say 'Me too' and 'Me neither' correctly in English.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf, wie man ' 
mich auch ' und ' mich keine ' richtig auf englisch sagt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur la façon dont dire 
'moi trop 'et 'moi ni l'un ni l'autre 'correctement en anglais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) em como dizer-me demasiado ' me
' e ' nenhuns ' corretamente em inglês.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) su come dirlo 'me ugualmente 'e
'nessuno 'correttamente in inglese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στο πώς να με πει "με επίσησ"
και "κανένασ" σωστά στα αγγλικά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
